Title: Relates to authorizing a residential redevelopment inhibited property exemption
Summary: Relates to authorizing a residential redevelopment inhibited property exemption; authorizes any city, town or village to, by local law, provide for a real property tax exemption for residential redevelopment inhibited property.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to authorizing a residential redevelopment inhibited property exemption
